analysis.description:
Reentrancy in FourtySevenTokenCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#552-563):
	External calls:
	- totalSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#554-555)
	- token.mint(tokenWallet,minterBenefit) (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#557-558)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#558-559)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalised (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#560-563)

FourtySevenTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#497-523) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#517-519)

FourtySevenTokenCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#525-552) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#547-548)

FourtySevenTokenCrowdsale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#552-563) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,minterBenefit) (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#557-558)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x1ed7ae1f0e2fa4276dd7ddc786334a3df81d50c0.sol#558-559)
